titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to make a grant to the State of Tennessee for the purpose of erecting a highway sign to inform motorists of the location of Blount Mansion in Knoxville, Tennessee.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

bill.summary: 7/1/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to make a grant to the State of Tennessee for the purpose of erecting a highway sign to inform motorists of the location of Blount Mansion in Knoxville, Tennessee.
